title: Cartoon Network flash game
content:
This font appears in the Courage the Cowardly Dog flash game [Creep TV](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203081012/http:/games.cartoonnetworkhq.com/playGame.php?gameID=50), hosted on the Cartoon Network website.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203081012im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled_5624.png)
author: Little Bird

comments.content: Thank you, that's very close! Can anyone identify the exact font?
I suppose that, with the right tools, you could analyse the flash file itself.
